Amazon Advertising

We offer ad solutions to help you find, attract, and engage millions of Amazon customers!

We are your ideal choice for PPC advertising

Pay-Per-Click (PPC) advertising is a big difference-maker when it comes to boosting your sales rather than getting more clicks for your listings.

Reduce Ad Spend

We bring down the ACoS (Advertising Cost of Sale) by focusing  on other key matters.

Increase Keyword Coverage

What is the key point on Amazon? The best visibility of your products. With our reliable keyword research tools, we target all the relevant keywords and customer search terms.

Efficient Ads

With regular optimization, our squad will improve your campaign’s performance! We will put your business for boosted Amazon PPC sales.

Squeeze more profits and save your time

Amaz.Markets professionals guarantee the best PPC services to the clients!

1

Optimized listings are important

For ads to be successful, you need to have visible listings. No matter how much money you spend on your ads, without optimized listings, people will not buy your products. Our specialists will study your listings to find all weak spots and fix your listings.

2

Ad Campaigns Audit

We will examine your ad campaigns via our algorithms, hard data, and experience to follow their performance. Our specialists will also analyze the reports and your potential to maximize ROI and sales, and all operations that should be improved.

3

Developing a plan of action

After studying your campaigns our manager will develop a plan of action, setting targets for every month. We share all the plans with our clients so that you are aware of every single step.

4

Let's get it started

Now it's all about our skilled group! You should just sit back and watch how our squad takes your ad campaigns to the tip-top levels. We will do our best to bring your ACoS down and boost your sales.

5

Watch and optimize

Once our managers have set up everything, we will monitor  the performance of your ads. We will constantly optimize your  ads further for improved efficiency.

6

Our dedicated manager

Our manager will be with you during your ads journey. He will guide you all the way and will give a piece of advice to ensure success.

Out advertising services

Our squad offers the highest standards of marketing services for your Amazon success. We ensure you get affordable but efficient PPC ads solutions.

What you get?

Optimized promotions, costing management, reports & analysis.

What we help to optimize?

  • Headline Search Ads;

  • Sponsored Product Ads;

  • Product Display Ads.

We will set you Amazon Ads:

  • Structuring different campaigns for product category, brand, top sellers;

  • Getting different ad groups (broad match, exact match);

  • Creating manual and automated PPC campaigns;

  • Identifying most relevant keywords;

  • Getting rid of low-performing keywords;

  • Revealing negative keywords;

  • Creating a list of cheap, long-tail keywords.

Our every ad is optimized for:

  • Title and body text;

  • Use of targeted keywords;

  • Targeted audience or Ad coverage;

  • Character length, ad duration, daily/weekly spending goal;

  • The most relevant keywords of your listing used  in Ads/campaigns.

Every Ad managed by us:

  • Defines the sales target for each ad group;

  • Optimizes CPC bids to reduce ad spend;

  • Optimizes CPC bids to reduce ad spend;

  • Bids on new keywords;

  • Defines break-even point for long-running promotions;

  • Sets daily, weekly and monthly ad costs and campaign  performance;

  • Introduces PPC bidding during periods like weekends, holiday  season, etc.

Take a look at Amaz.Markets  performance

  • Increase Your Sales by 3x.

  • Reduce Your ACoS up to 40% within 2 months.

  • Increase Your Profit Margin by 1.6x.

FAQ

What is the minimum subscription period for our services?

One should not expect drastic changes and results from Amazon ads in a day: it is solely a gradual process with constant optimization and analysis. Thus, we request a minimum commitment of three months to identify all the market trends and discover new keywords for improved performance.

What are the key metrics you consider?

Our goals are to bring down the ad spends, maximize ROI and sales. But the path to a low ACoS starts  with a hard-work:

  • To eliminate negative, repetitive keywords that are draining your money;

  • To define different keyword match types and ensure relevancy within the customer search queries;

  • To set default bid amount and daily budget;

  • To ensure your listing quality and make sure it is optimized;

  • To manage click-through-rate - a key indicator that tells us whether the ads are relevant.

How you make the changes to ads?

We will make all the changes directly in your Amazon Seller Central account after you give us all  the necessary permissions and the account link. These settings can be configured in your Seller Central account at any time and can be restricted only to the ‘Campaign Manager.’ Our actions are transparent  and you will be aware of all the steps.

Why should I use PPC ads?

PPC ads will increase your traffic to boost your product visibility on Amazon.

How do I know if PPC is working?

If you want to find out how your ads are performing, you can check out our Amazon PPC audit tool and get  a free PPC audit report.
